#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std ;
char a[100001] ;
int main()
{
scanf("%s",a);
int count = 0 , awsm = 0,i ;
char aw ;
int l = strlen(a) ;
for(i=0;i<l;i++) {
	char c = a[i] ; 
	if(i+1<l) {
		if(a[i+1] == c) {
			count++;		
			continue ;
			}
		else {
			if(count > awsm) {
				awsm = count ;
				aw = a[i] ;
				}
			if(count == awsm) {
				awsm = count ;
				if(aw > a[i]) aw = a[i] ;
			}
			count = 0 ;
		}
	}
	else {
		if(count > awsm) {
				awsm = count ;
				aw = a[i] ;
				}
			if(count == awsm) {
				awsm = count ;
				if(aw > a[i]) aw = a[i] ;
			}
			count = 0 ;
	}
	}
		
	
printf("%c\n",aw) ;
printf("%d\n",awsm+1);
return 0 ;
}
